1.0.4.name: wordpress/simple-admin-notes
1.0.4.description:
Like a built in notepad, can leave notes for clients or yourself.

Features :

  • Uses WordPress's built in custom post types
  • Works like a regular post
  • Functions with default WYSIWYG editor
  • Shows all "Notes" on one page in tab format
  • Will not show in front end or search
  • Requires default post privileges

Notes :

  • Preview button does not work, as WordPress makes it difficult to get rid of, just ignore it.
  • Aligning images might make it look weird.
  • Careful with the editor Markup as any broken or unclosed tags will effect the jQuery UI.
  • Not sure what happens if you add more then 8 or so notes to the tab styling.
